item.description:
We need volunteers for the Ron Paul booth at this years Hebron Fair. We'll have the projector, the banners, the handouts, etc. - but we need enthusiastic supporters to lend their time and get the word out.

Please RSVP and comment on what days / times you can make it. You're going to have to pay the daily vendor entrance fee of $5 per day, and we're going to need to give them a list of who'll be coming WITH drivers license numbers. I believe they need them verify booth workers, because the rate is normally $10 and they don't want people taking advantage.

Hebron Harvest Fair, September 6th through the 9th.

Hours:
Thursday, 4pm - 10pm
Friday, noon - 11p.m
Saturday, 9am to 11pm
Sunday, 9am to 8pm

Location:
Hebron Lions Fairgrounds
Route 85
347 Gilead Street
Hebron, CT 06248

www.hebronharvestfair.org
item.name: Hebron Harvest Fair September 6th - 9th.
